data.title: AT&T Performing Arts Center
data.text:
The Dallas Opera preserves the best of the art form by bringing Operaâ€™s biggest names and titles to North Texas, while premiering bold, original works that raise the cultural profile of North Texas. Learn More

TITAS/DANCE UNBOUND parters with AT&T Performing Arts Center as one of only a handful of presenting organizations in the nation dedicated exclusively to dance. For 40 years, it has been a vital leader and advocate for the arts.

From classical to cutting-edge, Texas Ballet Theater sets the standard for artistic excellence in ballet productions and education outreach programs in the North Texas region. Learn More

One of the leading regional theaters in the country, Dallas Theater Center is known for provocative, original works, beloved classics, respected arts education programs and a commitment to diversity and inclusion.

Broadway Dallas partners with AT&T Performing Arts Center to present and promote excellence in live musical theater with year-round performances for diverse audiences of all ages, impacting the lives of children and families.
